The Alberta Innovates Voucher Program , offered by Alberta Innovates , offsets a portion of costs related to technology development and building a working prototype. Funding is awarded as a voucher, which companies can use to pay product/service providers for their contributions towards the project, including labour and materials. Funding Amount Access vouchers to offset $10,000 to $100,000 in products or services received to accelerate technology development projects. Read More Eligible Applicants Alberta for-profit SMEs with fewer than 500 FTEs and less than $50 million in gross revenues annually are eligible to apply. Read More Eligible Activities Research, development, testing, and refinement to an innovation with a TRL of 3-6. Projects should result in the development of a pre-commercial technology. Read More Deadline to Apply Voucher Program – Alberta Innovates accepts a continuous intake of applications. Application approvals take 6-8 weeks from date of submission. Apply Now Apply for Funding Give your application the best chance at approval . Mentor Works has an 86% approval rating across all Canadian funding programs . This program may cover the costs of up to three service providers. It is important to note that the applicant of the program must pay a minimum of 25% of the contribution of total project costs in cash. Voucher Program – Alberta Innovates Eligible Applicants To be an eligible applicant, businesses must be a small or medium sized enterprise (SME) with a physical presence in Alberta, as well as: Be for-profit; Prove their is zero conflict of interest between the Applicant and Service Provider; Is a company with <500 Full Time employees, and <$50,000,000 in annual gross revenues; Is a legal entity incorporated in Alberta; and Is in good financial standing with Alberta Innovates, as well as any of AI’s subsidiaries. Voucher Program – Alberta Innovates Eligible Activities Projects should be the following to be eligible for funding: Have identifiable “go/no go” milestones; The project must be fully finished within a two year window; and Adhere to any other Alberta Innovates criteria that may arise. Moreover; Research, development, testing, and refinement to an innovation with a TRL of 3-6. Projects should result in the development of a pre-commercial technology Voucher Program – Alberta Innovates Program Deadline Voucher Program – Alberta Innovates accepts a continuous intake of applications.
